videoDetails.title: Are French People Really That Mean?! // French Girls React to Emily In Paris (in FR w/ FR & EN subs)
keywords: what is life in paris like
french react to emily in paris
videoDetails.shortDescription:
Learn French in a fun way! My sister and I react to the first episode of Emily in Paris, in French with subtitles in English and French! Are all those clichés about French people true? Are French people really that mean? We tell you all the truth about French people! 

#emilyinparis #learnfrench #pieceoffrench

If you enjoyed the video, subscribe to the channel so you know when I upload new videos: http://bit.ly/2PqFvh2

COME SAY HI!
Website: https://www.pieceoffrench.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/piece_of_french

VOCABULARY
réagir - to react
à peine - barely 
un immeuble - a building
un ascenseur - an elevator
ils ont du mal - they have a hard time
se débrouiller - to manage
à peu près - more or less
le rez-de-chaussée - groud floor (UK), first floor (US)
en plein cœur - right in the heart of
une épaule - a shoulder
chaleureux - warm
une chambre de bonne - a maid's room, an attic room
un loyer - a rent
un couloir - a corridor
chiant - annoying
un étranger - a foreigner
faire un câlin - to hug 
faire la bise - to kiss each other on the cheek
serrer la main - to shake hands
prendre quelqu'un de haut - to look down on sb
fumer - to smoke
un voisin canon - a stunning neighbor 
un sourire - a smile
accueillant - welcoming 
draguer - to hit on 
derrière ton dos - behind your back
à l'étranger - abroad
méchant - mean 
les congés payés - paid leaves 

USEFUL RESOURCES:
○ italki - find a private French tutor: http://go.italki.com/pieceoffrench (get $10 credits after your first purchase)
○ Hellotalk - find a language partner (free!) : https://brc.hellotalk.com/YouTube_Elsa
○ Quizlet - flashcard app (free!): https://quizlet.com/referral-invite/pieceoffrench?i=3c7doa&x=1Nqt
○ NordVPN - watch French TV shows from wherever you are in the world: https://nordvpn.com/pieceoffrench or use coupon code pieceoffrench
○ Epidemic Sound - find copyright free music: https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/zvec47/

RECOMMENDED BOOKS (for beginners / intermediate learners) 
○ My favorite grammar book (A1-B1): https://geni.us/hwpI (Amazon)
○ Collection Lire en français facile (A1-B2): https://geni.us/zs8187l (Amazon)
○ Ratatouille: https://geni.us/9wQBDb (Amazon)
○ Le Petit Nicolas: https://geni.us/2bBDPX4 (Amazon)

MY FAVORITE FRENCH READS! (for advanced learners)
○ Les Antisèches du bonheur: https://geni.us/Kbmb (Amazon)
○ La Verité sur l'Affaire Harry Quebert: https://geni.us/uLVdOmA (Amazon)
○ Changer l'eau des fleurs: https://geni.us/Q8i4DcU (Amazon)
○ Au revoir là-haut: https://geni.us/GrsgT (Amazon)
And my best advice: read & listen at the same time, this will allow you to expand your vocabulary, learn grammar naturally and improve your pronunciation in no time! You can find French audiobooks on Audible: https://amzn.to/2RVaSUQ

MY  EQUIPMENT
○ My computer (I love it, it's so light!): https://geni.us/mxjxdI (Amazon)
○ My phone (I film all my videos with it!): https://geni.us/nsOrS (Amazon)
○ Tripod: https://geni.us/3HN9s (Amazon)
○ Mini-Tripod: https://geni.us/4Pan (Amazon)
○ U Rig for Smartphone: https://geni.us/mhlUW (Amazon)
○ Lav Microphone: https://geni.us/5kucoA (Amazon)
○ Dual Lav Microphone (great for conversations!): https://geni.us/arVe (Amazon)
○ Gimbal (perfect for vlogging to stabilize the phone): https://geni.us/3SHO1V (Amazon)
○ Wireless Vertical Mouse: https://geni.us/g4t1Q (Amazon)
○ Wireless Keyboard: https://geni.us/KpMd (Amazon)

ABOUT PIECE OF FRENCH
Welcome to Piece of French, an immersive French learning experience! 
Follow me in my daily life as a native French speaker and learn French as it is actually spoken by real people. Gain vocabulary and master new idoms in their context, while improving your comprehension and pronunciation skills. Piece of French videos are more targeted at intermediate French learners.
French video with English subtitles and French subtitles! Learn French in a fun and authentic way thanks to real-life videos with a native French speaker!

DISCLAIMER: Links included in this description might be affiliate links. If you purchase a product or service with the links that I provide I may receive a small commission. There is no additional charge to you! Thank you for supporting my channel so I can continue to provide you with free content each week!
videoDetails.author: Piece of French
